feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.8
entry.content:
🛠️ Piece Framework

  • chore: introduce connections manager to triggers hooks (#7445) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

🐞 Bug Fixes

  • fix: stop logging axios errors fully in invalid oauth2 calim failure (#7477) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • refactor: log more into workers (#7478) @abuaboud

Thanks ❤️

@AbdulTheActivePiecer and @abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.9
entry.content:
🐞 Bug Fixes

  • fix: only clean up after exit (#7480) @abuaboud

Thanks ❤️

@abuaboud

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.10
entry.content:
🐞 Bug Fixes

  • fix: add missing resolve when internal error happens in the flow (#7499) @abuaboud
  • fix: missing images in README.md (#7493) @BemwaMalak

Thanks ❤️

@BemwaMalak, @abuaboud and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.11
entry.content:
✨ Exciting New Features

  • feat: support mcp permissions (#7469) @Gamal72

🧩 Pieces

  • feat(returning-ai): add reply message action (#7461) @mg-wunna
  • feat(bird): add scheduled for field (#7502) @geekyme

🎨 Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add caching for populated flow and enhance async webhook request (#7419) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: enhance async and refactor webhook handler (#7430) @hazemadelkhalel

📚 Documentation

  • fix: remove You from all contributors and add s31w4n as contributor f… (#7449) @s31w4n

Thanks ❤️

@Gamal72, @abuaboud, @dependabot, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @mg-wunna and @s31w4n

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.12

@abuaboud
